comment._content: www.aquarticles.com/articles/literature/Norfolk_Victorian... has a section on the Brighton Aquarium with a similar picture and some history. The aquarium is still functioning. A 2008 picture is at commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Brighton_Aquarium_-_Sea_L... www.arthurlloyd.co.uk/Brighton/BrightonAquarium.htm has a then and now pair of pictures -- 1926/2009
